cfg-warpsenabled.label: Vanilla Warps Enabled
cfg-warpsenabled.desc: When to enable the vanilla warps.
cfg-farmenabled.label: Farm Warp Enabled
cfg-farmenabled.desc: When to enable the farm warp.
cfg-accessdisabled.label: Access From Disabled
cfg-accessdisabled.desc: Access the network from disabled destinations.
cfg-accesswand.label: Access From Return Scepter
cfg-accesswand.desc: Access the network using the return scepter.
cfg-obeliskpatch.label: Patch Vanilla Obelisks
cfg-obeliskpatch.desc: Override the warps on the vanilla obelisks to work with custom destination coordinates.
cfg-menu.label: Enable Warp Network Menu
cfg-menu.desc: Enable the Warp Network menu. When this is disabled, the warp network can't be accessed from any of the statues.
cfg-warpcancel.label: Confirm Totem Warping
cfg-warpcancel.desc: When using a totem, confirm whether or not you want to use it.
cfg-wandreturn.label: Return From Wand
cfg-wandreturn.desc: When using the wand, saves your position and allows you to teleport back to it later.
